title: Gautam Adani inspires young India to lead the AI age
description: India's enduring strength, he noted, lies in its ability to align people, institutions and long-term vision. That same clarity must now guide how young Indians approach artificial intelligence, not as passive users, but as builders and leaders of capability.
content: Baramati (Maharashtra) [India], December 28 (ANI): In a call to young India, Adani Group Chairman Gautam Adani on Sunday urged the next generation of Indians to rise and lead the age of artificial intelligence (AI) as building indigenous AI models, s... [3960 chars]

title: China proposes strict rules for emotionally interactive AI
description: China is moving to rein in one of the fastest-growing frontiers of technology emotionally interactive artificial intelligence.
content:
China is moving to rein in one of the fastest-growing frontiers of technology emotionally interactive artificial intelligence.
On Saturday, the country’s cyber regulator unveiled draft regulations aimed at AI systems that simulate human personalities... [1872 chars]

title: Adani's journey is inspiration to hardworking youth: Pawar
description: BARAMATI, Dec 28: NCP (SP) chief Sharad Pawar on Sunday said industrialist Gautam Adani’s journey serves as an inspiration to hardworking youth who dream big. He was speaking at the inauguration of the Sharadchandra Pawar Centre of Excellence in Artificial Intelligence in Baramati in Pune district. The centre of excellence, funded by the Adani Group chairman, has been established under Vidya Pratishthan, the educational institute governed by the Pawar family. Sharad Pawar said Adani came from the drought-prone district of […]

title: India can't rely on foreign algorithms; must build its own AI models to protect jobs, data, intelligence: Gautam Adani
description: on Sunday made a strong case for India building its own sovereign AI capabilities, warning that unchecked dependence on foreign technologies could pose serious economic and strategic risks for the country, as he stressed that artificial intelligence has emerged as a defining force of the fourth industrial revolution.

title: As India’s law enforcement agencies turn to AI, the potential benefits, risks
description: In what ways can Artificial Intelligence help the work of police personnel? What are some possible risks and pitfalls of this? We explain.
content: Critics, however, say AI-driven policing risks deepening existing biases in law enforcement. Because such systems rely heavily on historical police data, they can reinforce patterns of over-policing and lead to unfair targeting of certain communities... [5412 chars]

title: Gautam Adani Unveils AI Centre In Baramati, Says Youth Must Lead Age Of Intelligence
description: Adani Group Chairman Gautam Adani on Sunday said that India is entering a decisive phase where technology, talent, and national purpose must move together and urged the next generation to rise and lead the age of artificial intelligence.

title: Seeds of tomorrow will be sown in algorithms: Gautam Adani at AI centre launch in Baramati
description: Adani Group Chairman Gautam Adani inaugurated the Sharadchandra Pawar Centre of Excellence in Artificial Intelligence in Baramati, Maharashtra. The Adani Group has partnered with Vidya Pratishthan to enhance AI collaboration, emphasizing the transformative potential of AI for India's progress and capability building.
